content: विबोधः {@--1@} Awakening, being awake. {@--2@} Perceiving, discovering. {@--3@} Intelligence. {@--4@} Awaking, becoming conscious, one of the 33 or 34 subordinate feelings (or व्यभिचारिभाव) in Rhetoric; निद्रानाशोत्तरं जायमानो बोधो विबोधः <ls>R. G.</ls> {@--5@} Inattention, absence of mind.
